con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions targetNamespace="http://www.xifin.com/schema/client" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:sch0="http://www.xifin.com/schema/client" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://www.xifin.com/schema/client" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://www.xifin.com/schema/client" xmlns:msgHeader="http://www.xifin.com/schema/msgHeader"> <xs:import namespace="http://www.xifin.com/schema/msgHeader"/> <xs:element name="RequestMessage"> name="Payload"> <xs:complexType> <xs:choice> <xs:element ref="AddClient"/> <xs:element ref="UpdateClient"/> <xs:element ref="UpdateContactData"/> <xs:element ref="DeleteClientCrossReferences"/> <xs:element ref="GetClient"/> <xs:element ref="UpdateSecondaryClient"/> </xs:choice> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="ResponseMessage"> name="GetClientResponse" type="GetClientResponse"/> </xs:choice> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:complexType name="GetClientResponse"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Get Client Response message structure</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="AccountName" type="AccountNameType"/> <xs:element name="ClientAccountType" type="ClientAccountTypeType"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="AvailableStatementFormats" type="ClientStatementFormat"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="SecondaryClients" type="GetSecondaryClientType"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="PrimaryClients" type="GetPrimaryClientType"/> name="AnnualDisclosureLetter" type="AnnualDisclosureLetterType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The available AnnualDisclosureLetters can be obtained using typetables webservice where tablename = AnnualDisclosureLetterType.
